{{disambig-more: '''Estel''' is the [[Sindarin]] word for ''Hope'' or ''Trust''.  It was a name of [[Aragorn]], given to him when his mother [[Gilraen]] took him to [[Rivendell]] as a child.<ref>{{App
*''Ónen i-'''Estel''' Edain, ú-chebin '''estel''' anim'', Gilraen's [[linnod]] = "I gave [[Aragorn#Names and titles
Hope: Hope]] to the [[Dúnedain]], I have kept no hope for myself."
